message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,350,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $1,350,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for it. This is a fair price considering the value to both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I propose to sell the product to you for $1,300,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1,300,000 is closer, I'm still limited to $1,275,000.  Let's meet in the middle and see if we can finalize this deal.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually beneficial solution. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to accept $1,285,000 for the product. This is a slight increase from my previous offer and I believe it will be agreeable for both parties.
